Text: thanx larrybomb ur the shit!! been waiting for this one in a smaller file will comment on quality when finished downloading.
I'm encoding a couple of things.  Trying to figure out what works best. I'll prob upload Justified season 2 episode 3 tonight.  Tomorrow night I'll try and do Big Bang Theory and Rules of Engagement.

Well...... sound is slightly off sync, so for that I'd give a 4 out of 10. But video is really good so I'd give an 8 out of 10. So, it's ok, but could really be better. It is the right size, though. I look forward to what else you have to offer. I'd love to find The Missing in handheld format for hubby by Sunday when he leaves.
I finished downloading i didn't see any problem with the audio, it was in sync. good job on the up for your first video A=9 V=10
